attributes.action: Teachs school pupils how to properly use the apostrophe from a young age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many student's do not know how to use apostrophe's correctly. This increasingly common error brings down the standard of written communication and really annoy's many people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
